00032         WorldState* loadScenario8()
00033         {
00034                 WorldState* state = new WorldState();
00035 
00036                 GameObject* background = new GameObject();
00037                 background->usesPhysics = false;
00038                 background->setSprite("Backgrounds\\background");
00039                 state->addBackgroundObject(background);
00040 
00041                 Ship* player = new Ship();
00042                 player->setSprite("Hulls\\Sample Hull");
00043                 player->isPlayer = true;
00044                 player->projectileBrain = &makeBoringBrain;
00045                 state->insertObject(player,point(100,300));
00046 
00047                 GameObject* director = new GameObject();
00048 
00049                 director->brain->addChild(
00050                         (new SequentialNode())
00051                         ->addChild(new SpawnShip(1))
00052                         ->addChild(new WaitForNextWave())
00053                         ->addChild(new SpawnShip(2))
00054                         ->addChild(new WaitForNextWave())
00055                         ->addChild(new IntCondition<>(getPlayerHealth,EQUAL,100)) //only spawn the "secret" enemy if the player didn't get hit fighting the other two
00056                         ->addChild(new SpawnShip(3))
00057                         ->addChild(new WaitForNextWave()));
00058 
00059                 state->insertObject(director,point(0,0));
00060 
00061                 return state;
00062         }
